definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The research on Pingxiang dialect has great significance.
sentences.chinese: 萍篆方言的研究，意义重大。

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 彻底解决了防风抗滑问题，保住重大设备不受损失。

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is an import geological problem which should have an effect on Three Gorges Reservoir Project.
sentences.chinese: 水库塌岸是影响三峡水库工程成败的重大地质问题。

sentences.english: Vacuum continuous soakage on sweetmeat is grand reformation of sweetmeat processing.
sentences.chinese: 蜜饯的真空连续浸渍是蜜饯加工工艺的重大革新。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微观面和宏观面的重大调整仍在进行之中。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情报机构策划了一项暗杀陆军部长的重大计划。

sentences.english: China has a big stake in Myanmar.It is the country’s leading foreign investor. Myitsone is one of manyhydropower, mining and infrastructure projects there.
sentences.chinese: 中国在缅甸拥有重大利益，是该国重要的外国投资者。

sentences.english: The disposal of municipal solid waste is an important project of environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 城市生活垃圾的处置是环境保护的一个重大课题。

sentences.english: "Upon detection, severe administrative punishments, including heavy fines and revocations of operating licenses, will be meted out, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 在监督下，将采取包括重大罚款和吊销执照等措施。

sentences.english: The heat therapy instrument with wlRA represents a substantial improvement for conventional heat therapy i.
sentences.chinese: 水滤红外线A热疗设备是对传统热疗设备的重大改进。

sentences.english: Chapter four sum up the basic characteristic and the last sum up great meaning of Ren Bishi's Party building thought.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要阐述任弼时的党建思想的重大意义。

sentences.english: This is a dream right Liezi a significant contribution to science.
sentences.chinese: 这是列子对梦学的重大贡献。

sentences.english: After about 6 months of silence, there have been some significant updates.
sentences.chinese: 在沉寂了6个月之后，这些内容终于有了重大的更新。

sentences.english: It is proposed that the occasion should be marked by a dinner.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议应该设宴庆祝这个重大活动。

sentences.english: One member of the commission dissented from the rest on two important matters.
sentences.chinese: 委员会中的一名在两件重大事情上与大伙产生异议。

sentences.english: In governance, the chief must consult with the Council on all important matters.
sentences.chinese: 酋长在管理上的重大问题上必须与议会磋商。

definition: to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
